text: okavela ippudu miru gayapadite, vastavaniki a jativaru (mi virodhulu) kuda ide vidhanga gayapaddaru. Mariyu memu ilanti dinalanu prajala madhya tripputu untamu. Mariyu allah, milo nijamaina visvasulevvaro cudataniki mariyu (satyasthapanaku) tama pranalanu tyagam ceyagala varini ennukovataniki ila cestu untadu. Mariyu allah durmargulanu premincadu
